title: You must be Level 7 or Higher to Comment Problem
body:
Hello, Seek here, and I've encountered a serious bug/glitch with the forums. I am level 17, but I cannot comment. 
I know I am supposed to be able to, so is there away this can be resolved?

replies.body: I have this issue, for some reason I can post a comment here, but literally no where else, hopefully it gets fixed eventually.
This is a test comment to see if the level sync works for me :)

Sometimes it requires a post in order to manually force a sync between your Summoner and Boards profiles. It seems this happened, as you show level 17 to me. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
What kind of post? A reply?
A reply can sometimes work, but creating a discussion such as this one (often called a post) works as well. It appears the issue may be resolved, though, but let me know.

I know this may seem rude but can you check out my post im having a problem with a in game issue [(http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/XNFriNzn-gameplay-can-type-in-chat-but-cant-cast-any-spells-or-activate-any-itmes-ie-wards)]
Does your issue happen when you log into an alternate account?
I can comment now, after commenting on my own post. Thanks .
i dont know sometimes me too
